meanings.definition: Courageous or brave like a lion.
meanings.sent1: The lionhearted knight fearlessly faced the dragon.
meanings.sent2: She admired her lionhearted friend for always standing up to bullies.
meanings.sent3: The lionhearted squirrel bravely challenged the cat for its acorns.
meanings.sent4: His lionhearted spirit soared as he stood up for what he believed in.
meanings.sent5: The lionhearted firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the trapped family.

meanings.sent1: The lionhearted soldier never backed down from a challenge.
meanings.sent2: The lionhearted athlete pushed through the pain to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The lionhearted chef fearlessly tried out new recipes, never afraid of failure.
meanings.sent4: Her lionhearted decision to start her own business paid off in the end.
meanings.sent5: The lionhearted explorer ventured into the unknown, eager for new discoveries.
